article_title: Refugees, Too, Must Navigate Health Care Law
article_text:
Eddie Almodovar, far right, a volunteer, helped refugee Aruna Rai, seated, sign up for a health insurance plan at an Austin apartment on Jan 30, 2014. Fellow refugees Khamba Magar, top left, and John Monger served as interpreters.

Under the Affordable Care Act, most Texans must have health insurance by March 31. That includes refugees, who often lack the English skills needed to understand the complexities of the American health care system. KUT News produced this story in partnership with the Austin American-Statesman.

Download audio file

article_summary:
That includes refugees, who often lack the English skills needed to understand the complexities of the American health care system.
Under the Affordable Care Act, most Texans must have health insurance by March 31.
Eddie Almodovar, far right, a volunteer, helped refugee Aruna Rai, seated, sign up for a health insurance plan at an Austin apartment on Jan 30, 2014.
Fellow refugees Khamba Magar, top left, and John Monger served as interpreters.
KUT News produced this story in partnership with the Austin American-Statesman.
